com.io7m.jcanephora.renderstate

Interface JCGLDepthStateType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JCGLDepthState, JCGLDepthStateMutable

    @Value.Immutable
 @Value.Modifiable
public interface JCGLDepthStateType
    Depth testing/writing state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default JCGLDepthClamping getDepthClamp() 
      default JCGLDepthStrict getDepthStrict()
      Enable or disable strict mode.
      Optional<JCGLDepthFunction> getDepthTest() 
      default JCGLDepthWriting getDepthWrite() 

    • Method Detail

      • getDepthStrict

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLDepthStrict getDepthStrict()
        Enable or disable strict mode. If strict mode is enabled, then attempting to enable depth writing/testing/clamping will fail with an exception if the currently bound framebuffer does not have a depth buffer.
        Returns:
        JCGLDepthStrict.DEPTH_STRICT_ENABLED iff strict mode is enabled

      • getDepthTest

        @Value.Parameter
Optional<JCGLDepthFunction> getDepthTest()
        Returns:
        The depth testing function, if testing is enabled

      • getDepthWrite

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLDepthWriting getDepthWrite()
        Returns:
        JCGLDepthWriting.DEPTH_WRITE_ENABLED if depth writing is enabled

      • getDepthClamp

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLDepthClamping getDepthClamp()
        Returns:
        JCGLDepthClamping.DEPTH_CLAMP_ENABLED if depth clamping is enabled
